text:
Hey all, running into a strange error that just popped up. and full disclosure could be a senior moment. Anywho,

When I try to run hs project upload to upload a CRM Card, i'm getting this error:

```The post in account 454179 was bad. Platform version is missing from your project configuration. Please add the platformVersion field to the hsproject.json file, then try uploading the project again. Available versions: [2023.2].```
however, I _do_ have 2023.2 in the hsproject file:

```{
  "name": "crmCard",
  "srcDir": "src",
  "platformVersion": "2023.2"
}```
has anyone run into this in the past? it provides the same error if I try to rename the CRM Card and push it

Hi Thomas, this is usually caused by using an old version of our CLI to upload. We are currently on version 5.2.0 so please double check and install the latest version and try again `npm install -g @HubSpot/cli@latest`
Hey guys. Is it possible to make an embedded one using UI components?

I want to use an iframe
```<iframe
  id="inlineFrameExample"
  title="Inline Frame Example"
  width="300"
  height="200"
  src="<https://www.openstreetmap.org/export/embed.html?bbox=-0.004017949104309083%2C51.47612752641776%2C0.00030577182769775396%2C51.478569861898606&layer=mapnik>">
</iframe>```
No unfortunately, you can't embed iframes
You can display iframes in modals though: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/sample-projects#display-an-iframe-modal>
<@U046M66LWTD> I see that you're embedding maps. Can you tell me more about what you're using these maps for?
